These data may be useful in air quality research and public health research.
https://doi.org/10.7927/a4mb-4t86.Project: Air Quality Data for Health-Related Applications

https://doi.org/10.7927/weq9-pv30.Description: The Global Pesticide Grids, Version 1.01, dataset contains 20 of the most-used pesticide active ingredients on 6 dominant crops and 4 aggregated crop classes. These data may be useful in environmental modeling, agricultural chemical contamination, and risk analysis research.
